item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 14th January
item.description:

item.title: Dog bin in alley off Larkhay Road and beside St Philips & St James churcht, 14th January
item.description:
The dog b√¨n is overflowing with black sacks hanging from it and poo bags piled on the ground around. It has been like this for a couple of weeks. Also the lid needs repairing or replacing, because it doesn't shut, and was smelly in the Summer.
